content: round 12 * ktbl p1 1/1lc p2 k13 p2 1/1 lc p1 * repeat to end round 13 * ktbl p1 k2 p2 k13 p2 k2 p1 * repeat to end round 14 * ktbl p1 1/1lc p2 k13 p2 1/1 lc p1 * repeat to end rounds 3 -- 14 two more times total of 3 times worked instructions continued crown shaping note you may want to switch to double point now round 15 * ktbl p1 ssk p2 3/3 rc k1 3/3lc p2 ssk p1 * repeat to end 88 sts round 16 * ktbl p1 k1 p2 k13 p2 k1 p1 * repeat to end round 17 * ktbl p2tog ×2 k13 p2tog ×2 * repeat to end 72 sts round 18 * ktbl p2 ssk k2tog ×2 k1 k2tog ×3 p2 * 48 sts round 19 ktbl p2 2/1rc k1 2/1lc p2 round 20 ktbl p2tog k7 p2tog 40 sts round 21 ktbl p1 ssk k3 k2tog p1 32 sts round 22 ktbl p1 k1 k3tog k1 p1 24 sts round 23 ktbl p1 k3tog p1 16 sts use a darning needle to gather last 16 stitches and finish crown row 3-14 repeat please follow marcimarra
